name: Wallace and Me
description:
This is a short little game that I made for the 48 Hour Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #1. I only had one full day free to work on it, but I like how it turned out.

-INFO-

You're a piano. Your trapped in a music store and the love of your life is being sold. Not cool, right? Time to make a change.

-HOW TO PLAY-

Find 8 missing keys lying around the shop to unlock the door. After you have enough keys you can play the "sheet music" on the pianos. (All the sheet music is the same. You just have to play it all the way through once)

Walk: W, A, S, D

Run: Shift

Interact: Left Click

Think that's about it!
